html:
Hospitality Etiquette

This module provides an in-depth exploration of Hospitality Etiquette in an international context, tailored for Level 3 International Hospitality Management students. It encompasses the intricacies of cross-cultural mannerisms and communication essential in the hospitality industry. Through the course, students will learn about diverse cultural norms, business etiquette, and the art of delivering impeccable service to guests from various backgrounds.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Grasp the significance and application of hospitality etiquette in various global cultural contexts.

+  Develop skills in effective verbal and non-verbal communication in diverse cultural settings.

+  Demonstrate the importance of professional appearance, grooming, and business etiquette.

+  Define exceptional service etiquette and the role of technology in hospitality etiquette.

Module Content:
